title: Olimpo: a Casa dos Deuses
description: Seven mortals must live together as Greek gods, competing to see who gets to gain Zeus’ (and the audience’s) approval to ultimately stay on Mount Olympus.
quote: Tonight there’s going to be blood in the Gods’ House.
altHero: host Divina McCall in front of CG clouds and lightning
alt1: two contestants look in the mirror
alt2: the Greek gods in a fancy living room waving at the audience
alt4: three contestants stand on pedestals in front of Divina McCall on a tv screen
